name: Mike Folire
description:
I’m a very caring, honest, sarcastic, humorous, shy, loving, hardworking, random type of individual.
I have a ton of ambition and a great personality to fit with it.
There are many qualities that I have that people don’t appreciate,
So I’m really hoping to meet someone who can accept me for who I am and can appreciate all that I do.
I’m not perfect and will never claim to be, but I am who I am and that’s all I think is applicable.
My ideal lady would be fun, outgoing, honest, laid-back but open minded with soft-lady tendencies.
Someone who enjoys dinners out and in and home made dessert.
I love to be active, so it would be great to meet someone who enjoys to play sports and can show me new ones also,
like skim boarding or scuba diving etc.
There’s a ton of new experiences living out by the beach and I hope to find a certain “you” who can show me the water sports.
I’m a good hearted man, looking for a good hearted woman to grow old with”.
If there is anything you want to know. Please don’t hesitate to fill me in.
